title.rendered: BigBlue Short Micro USB Cable 2 Pack 0.5ft, Micro-USB to USB Cable, Micro USB Lead Sync Data Cord for Android Samsung…

content.rendered:
Don’t Give Up on Comfort

How many occasions have you ever ended up with a bunch of tangled wires in your desk / automobile / purse?​

We all want a spare cable to carry round, handy and simple to use, to cost your cellphone when out of battery wherever you might be.
BigBlue’s Short Cables in Silicon are designed particularly for this: say bye to these lengthy and tangled cables, change them with not one however two brief cables, that can grow to be your finest touring companions.
Easy to put wherever you need, in any pocket of your bag or field of your automobile, to at all times have the whole lot so as.

If not for journey, you possibly can at all times use the second cable at residence or within the workplace, as a wonderful selection to preserve your desk away from all these threads.

(*2*)

Small isn’t Always Synonymous of Fragility

BigBlue’s Cables are coated in High Quality Silicon and structured with Copper Wires within the inside, for extra strenght and elasticity.

No matter whether or not knotted or bent on themselves, their resistance to greater than 5000 bends retains the cost secure, with out being influenced by the cable actions.

Choose the model that fits you essentially the most, 15cm or 25cm, you will get a Package of 2 Cables in predefined colours: Black & White.

Compatible with all Micro USB gadgets.

Choose the very best for your cost!

Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Built for Perpetuity – Soft versatile silicone materials, good contact feeling. With 5000+ bend lifespan power this cable will final a number of occasions longer than different commonplace cables
Ideal for Travel – This charging cable is just 15cm 0.5ft, simple to put in your bag and join with energy financial institution & Laptop
Full-Speed Sync & Charge – USB 2.0 high-speed charging and knowledge cable for cellphones, a number of shielding for interference-free knowledge transmission
Perfect Compatibility – USB cables for smartphones, tablets and different gadgets with micro USB connectors, e.g. Samsung Galaxy, HTC, Motorola, Nexus, Nokia, LG, Huawei, Sony, Blackberry, Kindle, Android smartphones and extra
What You Get – 2 Pack 0.5ft BigBlue Micro USB Cables, 2 Years Warranty and pleasant Customer Service
